articles.author: Siobhán O'Grady
articles.title: Why Soleimani's killing is different from other targeted attacks by U.S.
articles.description: The strike was much more consequential than those that killed Osama bin Laden or Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, analysts said.
articles.content:
How Trump decided to kill a top Iranian general
This is a very different level of escalation, said Anthony Cordesman, the Arleigh A. Burke Chair in Strategy at the Center for Strategic and International Studies. After targeted killings of extremists, he said… [+4659 chars]

articles.author: Michael Tesler
articles.title: Attacking Iran won’t help Trump win reelection. Here’s why.
articles.description: Military crises don’t always trigger a rally around the flag.
articles.content:
Voters are most likely to rally around the flag when there is bipartisan elite support
The rally around the flag effect happens when international crises increase support for the president at home. This effect is a major reason some might suspect that attack… [+3901 chars]

articles.author: Vadim Ghirda and Andreea Alexandru | AP
articles.title: AP Photos: Disabled Romanian children given chance to shine
articles.description: During Romania's communist era, children with disabilities were shunned, often locked away in institutions or kept at home and deprived of schooling and social interactions
articles.content:
At one event in Bucharest, youngsters with the genetic disorder staged a fashion show parading their own creations. The children also performed with a ballet ensemble on the International Day of Persons with Disabilities in early December.
The two shows were… [+2236 chars]

articles.author: Mustafa Salim, Kareem Fahim, Louisa Loveluck
articles.title: At Baghdad funeral procession for Qasim Soleimani, calls for retaliation against the United States
articles.description: The ceremonies on Friday, for Soleimani and Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, an Iraqi militia leader, were attended by thousands of people.
articles.content:
Helicopters shadowed the crowds. Death to America, death to Israel, people chanted. We will take our revenge!
Iran has vowed to retaliate against the U.S. for the killing of Soleimani, Tehrans most powerful military commander, as the Trump administration has… [+2750 chars]

articles.title: D.C.-area forecast: A chance of showers into tonight before cooler and gusty conditions Sunday
articles.description: Much of today should end up dry. Cooler weather for tomorrow.
articles.content:
Todays daily digit
A somewhat subjective rating of the days weather, on a scale of 0 to 10.
7/10: Much of the day may end up rain-free. Plus its on the warm side for January.
